statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.BrandName) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.SiteID , AA.Code , AA.Name , AA.Url , AA.ProductCount , AA.Description
FROM dbo.TScrapBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.SiteID = #SiteID#
AND ( AA.Code = #FindText# OR AA.Name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TScrapBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TScrapBrand ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, SiteID, Code, Name, Url, ProductCount, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #SiteID#, #Code#, #Name#, #Url#, #ProductCount#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TScrapBrand SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, SiteID = #SiteID# , Code = #Code# , Name = #Name# , Url = #Url# , ProductCount = #ProductCount# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
